round_best: Integrate adaptable gating mechanisms within Structured State Space Models to dynamically control the balance between recency influence and distant dependencies. This approach models the gating on a per-layer basis, where gates adjust their openness based on the variance and relevance of input features over time. Such mechanisms would allow SSMs to selectively enhance or suppress the influence of distant versus recent data points, potentially reducing the observed trade-off between recency bias and over-smoothing.
